tutorial.paragraph1:
Welcome to
the 1 vs. 1 game,
compete against
another player.
tutorial.paragraph2:
Select Mimbo or Luho,
your preferred
character.
tutorial.paragraph3:
Phase 1:
Collect pororós
on the dynamic bar.
tutorial.paragraph4:
Move with A-D
or the arrows,
action button
Enter or space.
tutorial.paragraph5:
Intercept pororós
with precision to
earn points.
tutorial.paragraph6:
Phase 2:
Spend pororós in
the store for items.
tutorial.paragraph7:
Buy up to
three items to
improve your
performance.
tutorial.paragraph8:
Phase 3:
Combat using skills
acquired in the store.
tutorial.paragraph9:
Throw daggers to
damage your opponent.
tutorial.paragraph10:
Random events
can change the
course of the battle.
